text: this is one month growth in an aeroponic Tower Farm on the island of Tahiti in French Polynesia where we were recently setting up an outdoor aeroponic vertical Farm which will grow leafy greens and herbs 12 months out of the Year this is true agricultural autonomy on an island where inhabitants are heavily dependent on food imports
